member.name: T:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs
member.summary: Instructions for how to connect to a remote endpoint.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.AgentSocketPath
member.summary: SSH Agent socket path. Default to environment variable SSH_AUTH_SOCK if present.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.DialErrorLimit
member.summary: Max allowed errors on trying to dial the remote host. -1 set count to unlimited. Default value is 10.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.Host
member.summary: The address of the resource to connect to.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.Password
member.summary: The password we should use for the connection.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.PerDialTimeout
member.summary: Max number of seconds for each dial attempt. 0 implies no maximum. Default value is 15 seconds.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.Port
member.summary: The port to connect to. Defaults to 22.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.PrivateKey
member.summary: The contents of an SSH key to use for the connection. This takes preference over the password if provided.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.PrivateKeyPassword
member.summary: The password to use in case the private key is encrypted.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.Proxy
member.summary: The connection settings for the bastion/proxy host.

member.name: P:ABKLabs.Runner.Ssh.Inputs.ConnectionArgs.User
member.summary: The user that we should use for the connection.
